state_analysis: Great! The data has been successfully cleaned and imported. Users and transactions are now in the database. Now I need to: 1) Generate database statistics report, 2) Create top users report, 3) Create backup verification report, and 4) Create the recovery completion marker.
explanation: I'll verify the data was imported correctly, then create scripts to generate all the required reports: db_stats.txt, top_users.csv, and backup_verification.txt.

commands.keystrokes: su - postgres -c "psql -d production_db -c 'SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;'"
su - postgres -c "psql -d production_db -c 'SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transactions;'"
